---
title: "Start your project"
---

## Pre-requisites

Make sure you are have done the steps presented in @sec-pre-requisites.

## Create the structure of your project

-   run `00_run_ME_once_to_create_structure.R`

## Update parameters

-   open `000_parameters.R` and update as necessary


## Update the texts for introduction

These texts are word documents. They should be prepared in advance to gain time and will be updated in several steps once some of the results are available.

- `00_update_texts_intro.R`
